https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7EsYcwzy8zazxLJfbKnVeCCnaEl.jpg Aanivaer is a Tamil independent film directed by Indian Tamil film director John Mahendran. The film was shot in Sri Lanka with a story and screenplay revolving around a love story amid the ongoing Civil War in Sri Lanka. Aanivaer
